Ivan Namme bụ onye Cameroon na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye nta akụkọ Ọ bụ onye isi nke Nam Productions & onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri dịka "Smokescreen" (2016), "Barefoot On Broken Bottles"(2015, na "A Little Lie a Little Killed"(2014) N'afọ 2017, ihe nkiri ya "A little lie A little at the Cameroon movie Achievement Awards
Oge izizi nke Namme na mba ụwa bụ (Before The Sunrise) ya na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood n'afọ 2006 bụ ndị bịara Buea maka ọrụ ahụ, ebe ọ bụ onye isi nkwukọrịta

O mere ọrụ ya na ndị Naijiria dịka Fred Amata, Olu Jacobs na Dakore Egbuson. N'afọ 2017, Bareta news depụtara ya n'etiti ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Cameroon iri kachasị elu, Ivan, a họpụtara ya ọzọ maka onye na-eme ejiji kacha mma site na Cameroon fashion award (CFA) na ụmụ nwoke.
